message.text: Memory Allocation with Excessive Size Value.

properties.author: NSA/Center for Assured Software
properties.description:
CWE: 789 Uncontrolled Memory Allocation
 BadSource: rand Set data to result of rand(), which may be zero
 GoodSource: Small number greater than zero
 Sinks:
 GoodSink: Allocate memory with malloc() and check the size of the memory to be allocated
 BadSink : Allocate memory with malloc(), but incorrectly check the size of the memory to be allocated
 Flow Variant: 33 Data flow: use of a C++ reference to data within the same function

taxa.name: Memory Allocation with Excessive Size Value

message.text: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection').

properties.author: NSA/Center for Assured Software
properties.description:
CWE: 78 OS Command Injection
 BadSource: connect_socket Read data using a connect socket (client side)
 GoodSource: Fixed string
 Sinks: execlp
 BadSink : execute command with execlp
 Flow Variant: 84 Data flow: data passed to class constructor and destructor by declaring the class object on the heap and deleting it after use

taxa.name: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
